TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SyndicationFeed extends System.Object

summary.span: 代表頂層摘要物件：Atom 1.0 中的 <> 和 RSS 2.0 中的 <>。

span.span: Represents a top-level feed object, <> in Atom 1.0 and <> in RSS 2.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當序列化至 Atom 1.0 時，寫入執行個體 <`feed`> 項目。When serialized to Atom 1.0, a instance is written to a <`feed`> element. 下列表格顯示在 類別中所定義的每個屬性，如何序列化成 Atom 1.0。The following table shows how each property defined in the class is serialized to Atom 1.0. |SyndicationFeed 屬性SyndicationFeed property|已序列化的格式Serialized form| |------------------------------|---------------------| |`AttributeExtensions`|中的屬性 <`feed`> 集合中每個屬性的項目。An attribute in the <`feed`> element for each attribute in the collection.| |`Authors`|<`author`> 針對每個項目集合中。An <`author`> element for each in the collection.| |`Categories`|A <`category`> 針對每個項目集合中。A <`category`> element for each in the collection.| |`Contributors`|A <`contributor`> 針對每個項目集合中。A <`contributor`> element for each in the collection.| |`Copyright`|A <`rights`> 項目。A <`rights`> element.| |`Description`|A <`subtitle`> 項目。A <`subtitle`> element.| |`ElementExtensions`|集合中的每個項目會寫入內 <`feed`> 項目。Each element in the collection is written within the <`feed`> element.| |`Generator`|A <`generator`> 項目。A <`generator`> element.| |`Id`|<`id`> 項目。An <`id`>element.| |`ImageUri`|A <`logo`> 項目。A <`logo`> element.| |`Items`|<`entry`> 針對每個項目集合中。An <`entry`> element for each in the collection.| |`Language`|未序列化。Not serialized.| |`LastUpdatedTime`|<`updated`> 項目。An <`updated`> element.| |`Links`|A <`link`> 針對每個項目集合中。A <`link`> element for each in the collection.| |`Title`|A <`title`> 項目。A <`title`> element.| 當序列化至 RSS 2.0 時，寫入執行個體 <`rss`> 項目。When serialized to RSS 2.0, a instance is written to an <`rss`> element. 下列表格顯示在 類別中所定義的每個屬性，如何序列化成 RSS 2.0。The following table shows how each property defined in the class is serialized to RSS 2.0. |SyndicationFeed 屬性SyndicationFeed property|已序列化的格式Serialized form| |------------------------------|---------------------| |`AttributeExtensions`|中的屬性 <`channel`> 集合中每個屬性的項目。An attribute in the <`channel`> element for each attribute in the collection.| |`Authors`|A <`managingEditor`> 項目，如果只有一個存在於集合中; 否則 <`a10:author`> 針對每個項目集合中。A <`managingEditor`> element if only one is in the collection; otherwise, an <`a10:author`> element for each in the collection.| |`Categories`|A <`category`> 針對每個項目集合中。A <`category`> element for each in the collection.| |`Contributors`|<`a10:contributor`> 針對每個項目集合中。An <`a10:contributor`> element for each in the collection.| |`Copyright`|A <`copyright`> 項目。A <`copyright`> element.| |`Description`|A <`description`> 項目。A <`description`> element.| |`ElementExtensions`|集合中的每個項目會寫入內 <`channel`> 項目。Each element in the collection is written within the <`channel`> element.| |`Generator`|A <`generator`> 項目。A <`generator`> element.| |`Id`|<`a10:id`> 項目。An <`a10:id`> element.| |`ImageUri`|<`image`> 項目。An <`image`> element.| |`Items`|<`item`> 針對每個項目集合中。An <`item`> element for each in the collection.| |`Language`|A <`language`> 項目。A <`language`> element.| |`LastUpdatedTime`|A <`lastBuildDate`> 項目。A <`lastBuildDate`> element.| |`Links`|<`a10:link`> 針對每個項目集合中。An <`a10:link`> element for each in the collection.| |`Title`|A <`title`> 項目。A <`title`> element.| ## Examples 下列程式碼顯示如何建立 執行個體並且將它序列化為 Atom 1.0 與 RSS 2.0。The following code shows how to create a instance and serialize it to both Atom 1.0 and RSS 2.0. [!code-csharp[SyndicationFeed#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationfeed/cs/program.cs#0)] [!code-vb[SyndicationFeed#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationfeed/vb/snippets.vb#0)] 下列 XML 顯示 如何序列化為 Atom 1.0。The following XML shows how a is serialized to Atom 1.0. [!code-xml[SyndicationFeed#1](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationfeed/common/atom.xml#1)] 下列 XML 顯示 執行個體如何序列化為 RSS 2.0。The following XML shows how a instance is serialized to RSS 2.0. [!code-xml[SyndicationFeed#2](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationfeed/common/rss.xml#2)]

summary.span: 使用指定的摘要來建立 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class with the specified feed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若 `cloneItems` 參數為 `true`，即複製來源 執行個體的所有 執行個體，並且新增至新 執行個體的 集合。If the `cloneItems` parameter is `true`, all instances in the source instance are cloned and added to the collection of the new instance. 若 `cloneItems` 參數為 `false`，則新 執行個體的 集合會包含對現有 執行個體的參考。If the `cloneItems` parameter is `false`, the collection of the new instance contains references to the existing instances.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AttributeExtensions As Dictionary(Of XmlQualifiedName, String)

public: property System::Collections::Generic::Dictionary<System::Xml::XmlQualifiedName ^, System::String ^> ^ AttributeExtensions { System::Collections::Generic::Dictionary<System::Xml::XmlQualifiedName ^, System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得屬性擴充的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of attribute extensions.

value.span: 字典，其中包含屬性延伸的集合。

span.span: A dictionary that contains a collection of attribute extensions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性延伸是指 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 規格中未指定的有效 XML 屬性。An attribute extension is a valid XML attribute that is not specified in either the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 當序列化至 Atom 1.0 時，每個自訂屬性集合中的會寫入 <`atom`> 項目。When serialized to Atom 1.0, each custom attribute in the collection is written to the <`atom`> element. 序列化為 RSS 2.0 時，每個自訂屬性寫入 <`channel`> 項目。When serialized to RSS 2.0, each custom attribute is written to the <`channel`> element. 如需加入屬性延伸的範例，請參閱[Loosely-Typed 延伸](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/loosely-typed-extensions-sample.md)範例。For an example of adding an attribute extension, see the [Loosely-Typed Extensions](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/loosely-typed-extensions-sample.md) sample. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何將屬性延伸加入至新聞訂閱摘要。The following code shows how to add an attribute extension to a syndication feed. [!code-csharp[LooselyTypedExtensions#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/looselytypedextensions/cs/program.cs#0)] [!code-vb[LooselyTypedExtensions#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/looselytypedextensions/vb/program.vb#0)] 下列 XML 會說明如何將屬性延伸序列化為 Atom 1.0。The following XML shows how an attribute extension is serialized to Atom 1.0. [!code-xml[SyndicationFeed#14](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationfeed/common/atom.xml#14)] 下列 XML 會說明如何將屬性延伸序列化為 RSS 2.0。The following XML shows how an attribute extension is serialized to RSS 2.0. [!code-xml[SyndicationFeed#15](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationfeed/common/rss.xml#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Authors As Collection(Of SyndicationPerson)

summary.span: 取得摘要作者的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of authors of the feed.

value.span: 表示摘要作者的 物件集合。

span.span: A collection of objects that represents the authors of the feed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當序列化至 Atom 1.0 時，每個集合中寫入 <`author`> 項目。When serialized to Atom 1.0, each in the collection is written to an <`author`> element. 當序列化至 RSS 2.0 時，如果只有一個存在於集合中，它會寫入 <`managingEditor`> 項目。When serialized to RSS 2.0, if only a single exists in the collection, it is written to a <`managingEditor`> element. 否則，每個寫入 <`a10:author`> 項目。Otherwise, each is written to an <`a10:author`> element. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何將作者加入至 的 集合。The following code shows how to add an author to the collection of a . [!code-csharp[SyndicationFeed#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationfeed/cs/program.cs#8)] [!code-vb[SyndicationFeed#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationfeed/vb/snippets.vb#8)] 下列 XML 會說明 集合如何序列化為 Atom 1.0。The following XML shows how the collection is serialized to Atom 1.0. [!code-xml[SyndicationFeed#16](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationfeed/common/atom.xml#16)] 下列 XML 會說明 集合如何序列化為 RSS 2.0。The following XML shows how the collection is serialized to RSS 2.0. [!code-xml[SyndicationFeed#17](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationfeed/common/rss.xml#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Syndication::TextSyndicationContent ^ Copyright { System::ServiceModel::Syndication::TextSyndicationContent ^ get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Syndication::TextSyndicationContent ^ value); };

summary.span: 為摘要取得及設定著作權資訊。

span.span: Gets and sets copyright information for the feed.

value.span: 表示摘要之著作權資訊的 物件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當序列化至 Atom 1.0 時，寫入 <`rights`> 項目。When serialized to Atom 1.0, the is written to a <`rights`> element. 當序列化至 RSS 2.0 時，寫入 <`copyright`> 項目。When serialized to RSS 2.0, the is written to a <`copyright`> element. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何設定 的著作權資訊。The following code shows how to set the copyright information for a . MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ElementExtensions As SyndicationElementExtensionCollection

summary.span: 為摘要取得項目延伸。

span.span: Gets the element extensions for the feed.

value.span: 包含摘要項目延伸的 執行個體。

span.span: A instance that contains the element extensions in the feed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目延伸是指 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 規格中未指定的有效 XML 項目。Element extensions are valid XML elements that are not specified in either the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 假設某個有效 XML 項目的命名空間與封入命名空間不同，您便可將任何此類項目新增為延伸。You can add any valid XML element as an extension, provided its namespace is different from the enclosing namespace. `` 如需加入項目延伸的範例，請參閱[Loosely-Typed 延伸](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/loosely-typed-extensions-sample.md)範例。For an example of adding element extensions, see the [Loosely-Typed Extensions](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/loosely-typed-extensions-sample.md) sample. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何將項目延伸加入至 執行個體。The following code shows how to add element extensions to a instance. [!code-csharp[LooselyTypedExtensions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/looselytypedextensions/cs/snippets.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LooselyTypedExtensions#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/looselytypedextensions/vb/snippets.vb#1)]

Public Function GetRss20Formatter (serializeExtensionsAsAtom As Boolean) As Rss20FeedFormatter

param.name: serializeExtensionsAsAtom
param.span: 指定是否以 Atom 1.0 命名空間序列化項目及屬性延伸。

span.span: A value that specifies whether to serialize element and attribute extensions with an Atom 1.0 namespace.

summary.span: 取得新的 執行個體。

span.span: Gets a new instance.
An instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非項目及屬性在命名空間之內，否則 RSS 2.0 規格只允許在規格中指定的項目與屬性。The RSS 2.0 specification allows elements and attributes that are not specified in its specification only if they are within a namespace. 當 `serializedExtensionsAsAtom` 參數為 `true``a10`時，格式器自動新增 命名空間限定詞至所有延伸；否則延伸不序列化。When the `serializedExtensionsAsAtom` parameter is `true`, the formatter automatically adds the `a10` namespace qualifier to all extensions; otherwise, the extensions are not serialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當序列化至 Atom 1.0 與 RSS 2.0 時，屬性寫入 <`title`> 項目。When serialized to Atom 1.0 and RSS 2.0, the property is written to a <`title`> element. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何設定 執行個體的 屬性。The following code shows how to set the property of a instance. [!code-csharp[SyndicationFeed#39](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationfeed/cs/program.cs#39)] [!code-vb[SyndicationFeed#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationfeed/vb/snippets.vb#39)] [!code-xml[SyndicationFeed#39](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationfeed/common/atom.xml#39)] 下列 XML 會說明 屬性如何序列化為 RSS 2.0。The following XML shows how the property is serialized to RSS 2.0. [!code-xml[SyndicationFeed#38](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationfeed/common/rss.xml#38)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual bool TryParseAttribute (string name, string ns, string value, string version);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool TryParseAttribute(string name, string ns, string value, string version) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Function TryParseAttribute (name As String, ns As String, value As String, version As String) As Boolean
protected public: virtual bool TryParseAttribute(System::String ^ name, System::String ^ ns, System::String ^ value, System::String ^ version);
abstract member TryParseAttribute : string * string * string * string -> bool override this.TryParseAttribute : string * string * string * string -> bool

span.span: The name of the element.
The namespace of the element.
The attribute to parse.

param.name: version
param.span: 剖析時要使用的新聞訂閱版本。

span.span: The syndication version to use when parsing.

summary.span: 嘗試剖析屬性延伸。

span.span: Attempts to parse an attribute extension.

returns.span: 指定是否已成功剖析屬性延伸的值。

span.span: A value that specifies whether the attribute extension was parsed successfully.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性延伸是指未由 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 規格定義的自訂屬性，Attribute extensions are custom attributes that are not defined by the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 它們會序列化為的屬性 <`feed`> （如果是 Atom 1.0) 或 <`rss`> （如果是 RSS 1.0) 項目，取決於所使用的新聞訂閱版本。They are serialized as an attribute of the <`feed`> (for Atom 1.0) or <`rss`> (for RSS 1.0) element, which depends upon the syndication version being used. 這個方法是延伸點，可讓您處理自訂屬性延伸的還原序列化作業。This method is an extension point that allows you to handle the deserialization of a custom attribute extension. 若要執行這項動作，您必須自 衍生類別，並且覆寫這個方法。To do this, you must derive a class from and override this method. 這個方法是針對所有無法辨識的屬性延伸來呼叫。This method is called for all unrecognized attribute extensions.

exception.span: 在讀取期間遇到無效的 XML。

span.span: Invalid XML Encountered during read.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual bool TryParseElement (System.Xml.XmlReader reader, string version);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool TryParseElement(class System.Xml.XmlReader reader, string version) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Function TryParseElement (reader As XmlReader, version As String) As Boolean
protected public: virtual bool TryParseElement(System::Xml::XmlReader ^ reader, System::String ^ version);
abstract member TryParseElement : System.Xml.XmlReader * string -> bool override this.TryParseElement : System.Xml.XmlReader * string -> bool

span.span: The to read from.

param.name: version
param.span: 剖析期間要使用的新聞訂閱版本。

span.span: The syndication version to use while parsing.

summary.span: 嘗試剖析項目延伸。

span.span: Attempts to parse an element extension.

returns.span: 指定是否已成功剖析項目延伸的值。

span.span: A value that specifies whether the element extension was parsed successfully.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目延伸是指 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 規格中未指定的有效 XML 項目。Element extensions are valid XML elements that are not specified in either the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 假設某個有效 XML 項目的命名空間與封入命名空間不同，您便可將任何此類項目新增為延伸。You can add any valid XML element as an extension, provided its namespace is different from the enclosing namespace. 這個方法是延伸點，可讓您處理自訂項目延伸的還原序列化作業。This method is an extension point that allows you to handle the deserialization of a custom element extension. 若要執行這項動作，您必須自 衍生類別，並且覆寫這個方法。To do this, you must derive a class from and override this method. 這個方法是針對所有無法辨識的項目延伸來呼叫。This method is called for all unrecognized element extensions.

exception.span: 在讀取期間遇到無效的 XML。

span.span: Invalid XML encountered during read.

span.span: The to write to.

param.name: version
param.span: 寫入期間要使用的新聞訂閱版本。

span.span: The syndication version to use while writing.

summary.span: 使用指定的新聞訂閱版本，將屬性延伸寫入指定的 。

span.span: Writes the attribute extensions to the specified using the specified syndication version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性延伸是指未由 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 規格定義的自訂屬性，Attribute extensions are custom attributes that are not defined by the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 它們會序列化為的屬性 <`feed`> （如果是 Atom 1.0) 或 <`rss`> （如果是 RSS 1.0) 項目，取決於所使用的新聞訂閱版本。They are serialized as an attribute of the <`feed`> (for Atom 1.0) or <`rss`> (for RSS 1.0) element, which depends upon the syndication version being used. 這個方法是擴充點，可讓您處理自訂屬性延伸的序列化作業。This method is an extension point that allows you to handle the serialization of custom attribute extensions. 若要執行這項動作，您必須自 衍生類別，並且覆寫這個方法。To do this, you must derive a class from and override this method. 這個方法是針對所有無法辨識的屬性延伸來呼叫。This method is called for all unrecognized attribute extensions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目延伸是指 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 規格中未指定的有效 XML 項目。Element extensions are valid XML elements that are not specified in either the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 假設某個有效 XML 項目的命名空間與封入命名空間不同，您便可將任何此類項目新增為延伸。You can add any valid XML element as an extension, provided its namespace is different from the enclosing namespace. 這個方法是擴充點，可讓您處理自訂項目延伸的序列化作業。This method is an extension point that allows you to handle the serialization of custom element extensions. 若要執行這項動作，您必須自 衍生類別，並且覆寫這個方法。To do this, you must derive a class from and override this method. 這個方法是針對所有無法辨識的項目延伸來呼叫。This method is called for all unrecognized element extensions.
